To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.

## File Structure {.unnumbered}

The suggested structure for this repository is designed to maintain clarity and keep related files together.

```txt
.
├── _book
├── _environment.yml
├── _quarto.yml
├── _site
├── ieee.csl
├── index.qmd
├── references.bib
├── sections

│   │   └── abstract.qmd

│   │   └── acknowledgements.qmd
│   ├── conclusion
│   │   └── conclusion.qmd
│   ├── introduction
│   │   ├── images
│   │   └── introduction.qmd
│   ├── references
│   └── results
│       ├── data
│       │   └── test_data.mat
│       ├── images
│       │   └── test_data_plot.png

└── styles.css
```
